hero_subtext: At CleanMyCSV, we treat your files as if they were our own: with maximum security and minimum lifespan.
sect1_p: Our infrastructure is designed so that no sensitive data can be intercepted or stored permanently.
sect1_li1: In-Memory Processing (RAM): Your file is cleaned "on the fly" in the memory of our Cloud Run servers without ever being written to a hard drive during the operation.
sect1_li2: End-to-End Encryption: All exchanges are protected by the HTTPS protocol (TLS) and a strict security policy (HSTS).
sect1_li3: Security: We use advanced protections against attacks (Rate Limiting, Helmet) to ensure service availability.
sect2_p: Unlike storage services, we are a processing unit. Your right to be forgotten is automated by code:
sect2_li1: Automatic Deletion: Once cleaning is complete, your clean file and its report are placed in secure storage (Google Cloud Storage).
sect2_li2: One-Time Secure Link: The download link provided to you mathematically expires after 15 minutes.
sect2_li3: Permanent Destruction: After this period, files are deleted from our servers. No one, not even our technical team, can recover them.
sect3_p: To improve the tool, we use Google Analytics responsibly:
sect3_li1: Anonymized Data: We collect global statistics (number of files processed, parsing errors) without ever linking this info to your identity.
sect3_li2: Cookie Management: Only cookies necessary for proper functioning and anonymous audience measurement are used. You can manage them via your browser settings.
sect4_p: In addition to protecting your data, we protect your computer. Our algorithm neutralizes malicious formulas (CSV Injection) by adding a safety apostrophe in front of suspicious cells.
